```{r}
library(ggplot2)
data(iris)
#set.seed(4000)
k = 3
km = kmeans(iris[1:4], k, iter.max=1000, algorithm=c("Forgy"))
km
dist = dist(iris[1:4])
mds = cmdscale(dist)

palette(c("#E41A1C", "#377EB8", "#4DAF4A", "#984EA3",  "#FF7F00", "#FFFF33", "#A65628", "#F781BF", "#999999", "#000000"))
plot(mds, col=km$cluster, pch = 20, cex = 3)

# plot centroids
km1 = kmeans(mds, k, iter.max=1000, algorithm=c("Forgy"))
points(km1$centers, col = 10, pch = 8, cex = 2)

#optional
barplot(t(km$centers), beside=TRUE, xlab="cluster", ylab="value")

```
